articles.title: 一文彻底搞懂 MCP App：从协议规范到实战开发
articles.titleEn: The Complete Guide to MCP Apps: From Protocol Specification to Practical Development
articles.description: 深入解析 MCP App 架构设计、协议规范、SDK API 和最佳实践，帮助开发者全面理解如何为 AI Agent 构建交互式 UI
articles.descriptionEn: A comprehensive deep dive into MCP App architecture, protocol specification, SDK APIs, and best practices for building interactive UI for AI Agents
